pages.title: Rotor Shaft
pages.text: The Rotor Shaft is the main component of the Turbine $(l:bigreactors:turbine/rotor)Rotor$(/l)$(br2)The Rotor Shaft blocks must be placed one after the other inside the Turbine and must encompass its entire length, starting from the $(l:bigreactors:turbine/part-rotorbearing)Rotor Bearing$(/l) and ending against a $(l:bigreactors:turbine/part-casing)Housing$(/l) block on the other side.$(br2)
$(l)Mandatory:$() yes$(br)$(l)Valid positions:$() inside the Turbine$(br)$(l)Variants:$() all$(br)$(l)Graphical interface:$() no
